dempred.datastructure

Class Datapoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.datastructure.Datapoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Datapoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Datapoint is the central structure for machine learning tasks. A single Datapoint contains all descriptors (features) together with group (for classification) and value (for regression) information.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Datapoint.PredictedValueComparatorAsc
      An internal comparator class used to sort datapoint by their predicted value in ascending order.
      static class  Datapoint.PredictedValueComparatorDesc
      An internal comparator class used to sort datapoint by their predicted value in descending order.
      static class  Datapoint.ValueComparatorAsc
      An internal comparator class used to sort datapoint by their value in ascending order.
      static class  Datapoint.ValueComparatorDesc
      An internal comparator class used to sort datapoint by their value in descending order.

    • Field Detail

      • comment

        protected java.lang.String comment
        Used for additional information on a datapoint.

      • group

        protected java.lang.Integer group
        The group of a datapoint for classification tasks (e.g. -1 for negative, +1 for positive datapoints)

      • weight

        protected double weight
        Can be used to weigh more reliable data points higher than others during learning. OUtliers for example should be weighted lower than other datapoints. E.g. all datapoints weight=1.0 and outliers weight=0.5

      • value

        protected double value
        The value of the datapoint. For regression tasks this is the value which the classifier tries to predict. For classification tasks 'value' should be set to -1 or +1 for negative and positive datapoints respectively.

      • predictedGroup

        protected java.lang.Integer predictedGroup
        Contains the predicted group after prediction.

      • predictedValue

        protected double predictedValue
        Contains predicted value after prediction.

      • featureVector

        protected FVector featureVector
        The feature vector which contains all descriptors of this datapoint.

      • extended

        protected boolean extended
        A boolean indicating if this datapoint's featureVector is extendet by an additional value set to 1.0. This is used to encode the bias parameter 'b'
